page.title: 02EAST VALLEY FARM
page.content:
This farm is situated at the North Western corner of the D. Block.It is a mixed farm- rather small -only 500 acres. The owner,Mr.Lyons,works there with the help of three other workers. He grows 250 acres of barley,100 acres of wheat and 150 acres of grass for fodder.He also has 175 cattle which are a mixture of Sussex,Aberdeen Angus,Hereford and Friesian.
In the harvest season Mr.Lyons uses all his machinery - tractors,combines and binders as this is the busiest time of the year. The farm produces about 900 tons of corn each year and they have to make sure it is dry by using dryers or the dealers will not buy it if it is too damp.
